name: English Lemon Curd
author: Al & Marti Voss
summary: Lemony tart and just a little sweet. Wonderful on scones or croissants.
ingredients: 1 ½ cups freshly squeezed lemon juice
¼ cup freshly grated lemon zest
directions: Combine lemon juice, eggs, butter, sugar, and lemon zest in a 2-quart saucepan; cook over medium-low heat, stirring constantly, until curd is thick and just beginning to boil, about 8 minutes
Remove curd from heat and cool to room temperature, stirring occasionally to keep the surface soft, about 30 minutes
Pour curd into clean jars, seal, and store in the refrigerator
